thread.title: Paul Singer Takes On Europe Inc.

author: Eric Sylvers
title: Paul Singer Takes On Europe Inc.

organizations.name: paul singer takes on europe inc

text:
Elliott Management Corp., the American activist fund, is on a tear in Europe.
Capping a series of big investments in the continent over the past two years, Elliott this week launched a proxy fight at Telecom Italia, the one-time state-owned telecommunications giant.
Elliott has disclosed a 3% holding and nominated a slate of directors to... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
